dialogs: A notebook of death.. How to use it..

The human whose name is written
 in this shall die?
It's no different from a chain letter
written in this shall die..?" C'mon.
This note will not effect unless the writer

has person's face in their mind 
when writing his/her name.

Therefore.. People sharing the 
same name will not be affected.

If the cause of death is written, 
within 40 seconds of writing, it will happen

if the cause is not written, 
person will die of heart - attack
